Blog.post: Ok, by popular demand i am being forced by the powers that be to make another entry in this journal. ok form what i understand the who thing with Dustin and Shelia was succsesful as the movie Gilli (its alright D just keep on tryin , anyway ITS ALL PLATNIUM). Saturday i saw man on fire w/ Denzel WAshington, that shit is better than training day. Denzel is one bad muthafuka. my favorite line: "Last wish? I wish....U had...More time." anyway go see that shit. so now for the question of the day? Would you rather take one punch from Mike Tyson in the face? or Would u get kicked in the by Bruce Lee well nothin much really happened this week except hear shit throught the grape vine oh, dustin and vito i really think that that thing that trade u guys were think'in bout doin would be a good idea especially for Dustin
I'll make a post in a few hour by popular demand, im just shit tired and need to go sleep

it seems that Abe is still hoping to hook Dustin up w/ Shelia. i mean with dustin the way he is that kid has NO CHANSE...sorry son. anyway ummm...Claudie has entruted me with the information of Mary wanting to break up w/ big Jack, yet everyone seems to know about this already, i guess there is no real secret. i cant wait for May cause then im gonna be going go ACEN w/ David, Pat, Lisa, Brenden, Finiack, etc. ok if u r reading this i want to know would u rather be a ninja or a jedi? Who is gonna break up next im taken bets: Lily and Eli Abe and Danella Big Jack and Mary Vito and Giezelle Sus and Wall Dustin and his bottle of lotion or NOBODY(there all staying together 4 eva) OK Watch the Chapelle Show tonight Bitches Peace Out

WHAT UP BITCHES THIS IS MY FIRST POST SO HERE NOTHING IMPORTANT DUSTIN IS ACTING LIKE A LITTLE BITCH BUT WHATEVER. VITO GOT JABBED IN THE MOUTH BY DUSTIN AND I HATE SR. KENNEDY NOT CAUSE HE'S GAY BUT HE SUCKS BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

[Intro] Fury Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh [Repeat 4x] Game over, Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip [Verse One] Ah shit, y'all done fucked up and let me in this bitch I'm just your average hood nigga with dreams of gettin' rich (But you don't hear me) My crib big like a football field (football field) You might fuck around and think I signed a football deal (But you don't hear me) I take 15 minutes to drop a track (yeah) I take half a minute to load my gats (But you don't hear me) I make 'em gloss all across the globe I'm a pimp, I got your hoe takin' off her clothes (But you don't hear me) A franchise like a Houston Rocket (Houston Rocket) Every eight months is when I usually drop it (But you don't hear me) I got the streets on lock, I like my beats with knock You know my heat stay cocked, niggaaaaa [Chorus] (Now who they want?) Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip (game over) Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip (Now who they want?) Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip (game over) Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip (Now who they want?) Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip (game over) Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip (Now who they want?) Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip, Flip (game over) [Verse Two] Look, I'm a Christal nigga and you a red-winer You just an opening act, but I'm the headliner (But you don't hear me) I'm 'bout to ship 3 mill' off top You got your deal off your man, I got my deal off props (But you don't hear me) I'm “Connected” like Dub and Mack 10 with Ice Cubes in my watch And Dubs on the black Benz (But you don't hear me) I'm getting' paid 'cause I do all the work It's rainy days if we don't move all our work, we go bizirk (But you don't hear me) I'm on the block fam, in the cream drop Lam Mostly our cats with deals, y'all ain't hot man (But you don't hear me) I'm 'bout to do it again, you 'bout to lose it again It's show and tell motherfucker, I'm a prove it again [Chorus] The game over, 'cause shit about to change over It's 'bout time 'cause hip-hop need a make over (But you don't hear me) If most producers want to charge too much But around my way that's how you get fucked up (But you don't hear me) You might think we all beats and rhymes But way before this rap shit, nigga, the streets was mine (But you don't hear me) I got that hot shit, that "Thug Life" 'Pac shit That get hot shit, that B.I.G. "Ready to Die" shit [Chorus] this is up for a reason....those people who know why anyway yesterday i saw the realization of the fact that i am one of if not the strongest in our group, Eli...Vito ur the only two left I FUKIN HATE THAT FAT BASTARD TRACY HE TOOK MY PHONE AND GAVE ME 2 JUGS YO BUT WHATEVA IM A HIS LIFE HELL NEXT YEAR

Ok, im back My weekend rocked, well what i remember of it anyway. ACEN was hot i chilled did shit, nuttin big. evryone is back from the Natti and they all did pretty bad but whatever ummm cant will finish later

Sing along with the theme song! Ride on the Magic School Bus Cruisin' on down Main Street You're relaxed and feelin' good Next thing that you know you're seein' Octopus in the neighborhood! Surfin' on a sound wave Swingin' through the stars Take a left at your intestine Take your second right past Mars. On THE MAGIC SCHOOL BUS Navigate a nostril Climb on THE MAGIC SCHOOL BUS Spank a plankton, too On our Magic School Bus Raft a river of lava On THE MAGIC SCHOOL BUS Such a fine thing to do! So strap your bones right to the seat Come on in and don't be shy — Just to make your day complete You might get baked into a pie On THE MAGIC SCHOOL BUS... Step inside — it's a wilder ride! Come on — ride on THE MAGIC SCHOOL BUS! .......Abe Ok im starting to hear bit and pieces of wha happened at Detroit, and first of all eli im sorry kid well since this is only 6th period and im gonna leave u w/ the best line ever in the history of time lets see who can guess where its from and who said it: Jules: You read the Bible? Ringo: Not regularly. Jules: There's a passage I got memorized. Ezekiel 25:17. "The path of the righteous man is beset on all sides by the inequities of the selfish and the tyranny of evil men. Blessed is he who, in the name of charity and good will, shepherds the weak through the valley of the darkness. For he is truly his brother's keeper and the finder of lost children. And I will strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger those who attempt to poison and destroy my brothers. And you will know I am the Lord when I lay my vengeance upon you." I been sayin' that shit for years. And if you ever heard it, it meant your ass. I never really questioned what it meant. I thought it was just a cold-blooded thing to say to a motherfucker before you popped a cap in his ass. But I saw some shit this mornin' made me think twice. Now I'm thinkin': it could mean you're the evil man. And I'm the righteous man. And Mr. .45 here, he's the shepherd protecting my righteous ass in the valley of darkness. Or it could be you're the righteous man and I'm the shepherd and it's the world that's evil and selfish. I'd like that. But that shit ain't the truth. The truth is you're the weak. And I'm the tyranny of evil men. But I'm tryin, Ringo. I'm tryin' real hard to be the shepherd. ok im out, 4 days till ACEN muthafukas HA HA HA.....Bitches

ok once again i have been proded into updating my blog so here bitches: Friday i came in didnt do any homework played madden till like 11 then realized i had the SAT the next morning, so i went beddy bye. Saturday i woke in a kinda shitty mood (irritated more than anythin) cause i had to take the SAT and i wanted to go back to sleep. anyway i got to whitney young and saw the usual losers i hang with Eli, thena, sus, and Abe who barely go there on time. i went to dave and busters and then went home and went to sleep Sunday i did math and science and religion. ok to those who know what im takin bout, u know that person that i'm kinda feelin right now yea there sayin some interestin shit and i dont know how to talk to them so give me some feedback okay Who would win in a fight list first to last: Dustin Vito Eli Abe Khem Jack Sam OK, THATS A RAP KEEP IT GUTTA KEEP IT GRIMEY, ONE

my ma is on my ass for no damn reason. i wish she would leave me the hell alone, i got a fuckin job and go to the gym 4 days a week and she still finds time to bust my balls over shit. i need to fuckin drink, light up and relax. god i hate parents man, i need to get fuckin layed. Hitler's Got cathlosim and the other 3 prvinces and Ghandi's got ms. red, gray and purple. shit i need to get 2 dimes and nickle(to balance out the scale). well im done im out

ook we need to decide what we r going to do on the weekend, that shit was stupid sittin in vito's car for like 30min's wastin time. i say we should go to the movies or some shit. WE HAVE TO USE GIZZ'S FATHER'S NEW CAR I HEAR ITS OFF THE CHAIN, anyway im off to go lift at the gym. well im out peace

Background music: What Happened - Ying Yang Twins Day 2 of work is over, it was super sucky because they have me scrapin a damn fence all fuckin day. yesterday my glasses fell apart literaly, but now i got a new pair and they r very hot, well other than that nothin has happened so im gonna go play fight night peace out

ok today was my first day of work it kinda sucked balls i spent all day getting all the old paint off the one huge fukin fence, shit wasnt fair. i also found out that every other week i'll be workin in my own office everyother week HELL YEA MOVIN ON UP SON. any way, ABE im sorry bout ur dilema, i've finally figured out the difference between a girl who u just want to bus-a-nut in and a girl u want to be ur girlfriend. i think there's a girl who acutally falls under girlfriend and not just a potential seeman recptical. i spent life 2 hrs online w/ her on an actually interesting topic, i wasnt just BSing so that she would think i was interested in what she was when i'm not. WOW AM I STARTIN TO ACTUALLY GROW UP......NAH!!! I PASSED'ED MY DRUG TEST SMOKES UP KIDDIES!!!!!! COMMENTS ON: WHO WILL HOOK UP/BREAK UP NEXT?

Ok i havent posted in more than 2 months and alot has happend since then as most of you know already, i've been fuckin isabelle for like a month now its like we're bf/gf but i think she wants to, so whatever i think i'll let her keep thinkin that's what we're doin (as a side note the day after i fucked her, she called me bitchin about how i streched her out and how she couldn't cross her legs the next day, IM FUCKIN AWESOME) . in other news vito and dustin have gone on vacation. Vito went to Bean-town and Dustin went on the agricultral tour of southern illinois, and a quest to find the mythical Huevos de dustino. i cant wait till senior year my mission is to "de-flower" as many freshman, sophmores, and freshman as possible. during this year i will also recording all of this year so i can look back on it during my later year and see where i went wrong and or mabye just to reminise about days gone past. i am some how un-banned from the crew team and thats good to know, so now im not gonna have to do lacrosse. lately i've been studying Karv magra and the bodies pressure points, i dont know why but i feel it will b useful next year. Work ends for me on friday and saturday i go to tha NYC and Abe goes to bum fuck ohio, so guess we all go on vaction in pairs. so i'll try to update more often other than that nothin else to say Mr. Pink OUT!!!!!!!!!!
